title: Wood-style plank flooring, Separate dining area, Onsite playground
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Two-tone paint scheme Select units-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-Separate dining area-Ceiling fans in dining room-Oversized walk-in closets-Wood-style plank flooring-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity
